verses.verse: Now these <S%H428><s%> are the people <S%H1121><s%> of the province <S%H4082><s%> who came <S%H5927><s%> up out of the captivity <S%H7628><s%> of the exiles <S%H1473><s%> whom <S%H834><s%> Nebuchadnezzar <S%H5019><s%> the king <S%H4428><s%> of Babylon <S%H894><s%> had carried <S%H1540><s%> away <S%H1540><s%> to Babylon, <S%H894><s%> and returned <S%H7725><s%> to Jerusalem <S%H3389><s%> and Judah, <S%H3063><s%> each <S%H376><s%> to his city. <S%H5892><s%>

These <S%H834><s%> came <S%H935><s%> with Zerubbabel, <S%H2216><s%> Jeshua, <S%H3091><s%> Nehemiah, <S%H5166><s%> Seraiah, <S%H8304><s%> Reelaiah, <S%H7480><s%> Mordecai, <S%H4782><s%> Bilshan, <S%H1114><s%> Mispar, <S%H4558><s%> Bigvai, <S%H902><s%> Rehum, <S%H7348><s%> and Baanah. <S%H1196><s%> The number <S%H4557><s%> of the men <S%H376><s%> of the people <S%H5971><s%> of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Parosh, <S%H6551><s%> 2172;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah, <S%H8203><s%> 372;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Arah, <S%H733><s%> 775;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pahath-moab of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3091><s%> [and] Joab, <S%H3097><s%> 2812;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Elam, <S%H9405><s%> 1254;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zattu, <S%H2240><s%> 945;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Zaccai, <S%H2140><s%> 760;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bani, <S%H1137><s%> 642;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bebai, <S%H893><s%> 623;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azgad, <S%H5803><s%> 1222;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adonikam, <S%H140><s%> 666;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bigvai, <S%H902><s%> 2056;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Adin, <S%H5720><s%> 454;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ater <S%H333><s%> of Hezekiah, <S%H2396><s%> 98;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bezai, <S%H1209><s%> 323;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jorah, <S%H3139><s%> 112;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hashum, <S%H2828><s%> 223;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gibbar, <S%H1402><s%> 95;
the men <S%H1121><s%> of Bethlehem, <S%H1035><s%> 123;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Netophah, <S%H5199><s%> 56;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Anathoth, <S%H6068><s%> 128;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Azmaveth, <S%H9397><s%> 42;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Kiriath-arim, Chephirah, <S%H3716><s%> and Beeroth, <S%H881><s%> 743;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ramah <S%H7414><s%> and Geba, <S%H1387><s%> 621;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Michmas, <S%H4363><s%> 122;
the men <S%H376><s%> of Bethel <S%H1008><s%> and Ai, <S%H5857><s%> 223;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Magbish, <S%H4019><s%> 156;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the other <S%H312><s%> Elam, <S%H9405><s%> 1254;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harim, <S%H2766><s%> 320;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lod, <S%H3850><s%> Hadid, <S%H2307><s%> and Ono, <S%H207><s%> 725;
the men <S%H1121><s%> of Jericho, <S%H3405><s%> 345;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Senaah, <S%H5570><s%> 3630.
The priests: <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jedaiah <S%H3048><s%> of the house <S%H1004><s%> of Jeshua, <S%H3091><s%> 973;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Immer, <S%H564><s%> 1052;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pashhur, <S%H6583><s%> 1247;
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harim, <S%H2766><s%> 1017.
The Levites: <S%H3881><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jeshua <S%H3091><s%> and Kadmiel, <S%H6934><s%> of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hodaviah, <S%H1938><s%> 74. <S%H7657><s%> <S%H702><s%>
The singers: <S%H7891><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asaph, <S%H623><s%> 128.

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of the gatekeepers: <S%H7778><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shallum, <S%H7967><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ater, <S%H333><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Talmon, <S%H2929><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Akkub, <S%H6126><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hatita, <S%H2410><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shobai, <S%H7630><s%> in all <S%H3605><s%> 139.
The temple <S%H5411><s%> servants: <S%H5411><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ziha, <S%H6727><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hasupha, <S%H2817><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Tabbaoth, <S%H2884><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Keros, <S%H7026><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Siaha, <S%H5517><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Padon, <S%H6303><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Lebanah, <S%H3838><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hagabah, <S%H9117><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Akkub, <S%H6126><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hagab, <S%H2285><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shalmai, <S%H8014><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hanan, <S%H2605><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Giddel, <S%H1435><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gahar, <S%H1515><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Reaiah, <S%H7211><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Rezin, <S%H7526><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nekoda, <S%H5353><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Gazzam, <S%H1502><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Uzza, <S%H5798><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Paseah, <S%H6454><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Besai, <S%H1153><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Asnah, <S%H619><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Meunim, <S%H4586><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nephisim, <S%H5304><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bakbuk, <S%H1227><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hakupha, <S%H2709><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harhur, <S%H2744><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Bazluth, <S%H1213><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Mehida, <S%H4240><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Harsha, <S%H2797><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Barkos, <S%H1302><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sisera, <S%H5516><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Temah, <S%H8547><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Neziah, <S%H5335><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hatipha. <S%H2412><s%>

The sons <S%H1121><s%> of Solomon's servants: <S%H5650><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Sotai, <S%H5479><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hassophereth, <S%H5618><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Peruda, <S%H6514><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Jaalah, <S%H3279><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Darkon, <S%H1874><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Giddel, <S%H1435><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Shephatiah, <S%H8203><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hattil, <S%H2411><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Pochereth-hazzebaim, the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Ami. <S%H532><s%>
All <S%H3605><s%> the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants, <S%H5411><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Solomon's servants, <S%H5650><s%> were 392.

Now these <S%H428><s%> are those who came <S%H5927><s%> up from Tel-melah, Tel-harsha, Cherub, <S%H3743><s%> Addan, <S%H135><s%> [and] Immer, <S%H564><s%> but they were not able <S%H3201><s%> to give <S%H5046><s%> evidence <S%H5046><s%> of their fathers' households, <S%H1004><s%> and their descendants, <S%H2233><s%> whether <S%H518><s%> they were of Israel: <S%H3478><s%>
the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Delaiah, <S%H1806><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Tobiah, <S%H2900><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Nekoda, <S%H5353><s%> 652.

And of the sons <S%H1121><s%> of the priests: <S%H3548><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Habaiah, <S%H2252><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Hakkoz, <S%H6976><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Barzillai, <S%H1271><s%> who <S%H834><s%> took <S%H3947><s%> a wife <S%H802><s%> from the daughters <S%H1323><s%> of Barzillai <S%H1271><s%> the Gileadite, <S%H1569><s%> and he was called <S%H7121><s%> by their name. <S%H8034><s%>

These <S%H428><s%> searched <S%H1245><s%> [among] their ancestral <S%H3187><s%> registration, <S%H3791><s%> <S%H3187><s%> but they could not be located; <S%H4672><s%> therefore they were considered unclean <S%H1351><s%> [and excluded] from the priesthood. <S%H3550><s%>

And the governor <S%H8660><s%> said <S%H559><s%> to them that they should not eat <S%H398><s%> from the most <S%H6944><s%> holy <S%H6944><s%> things <S%H6944><s%> until <S%H5704><s%> a priest <S%H3548><s%> stood <S%H5975><s%> up with Urim <S%H224><s%> and Thummim. <S%H8550><s%>
The whole <S%H3605><s%> assembly <S%H6951><s%> numbered <S%H259><s%> 42360,

besides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H905><s%> their male <S%H5650><s%> and female <S%H519><s%> servants, <S%H5650><s%> <S%H519><s%> who <S%H428><s%> numbered 7337; and they had 200 singing <S%H7891><s%> men and women.
Their horses <S%H5483><s%> were 736; their mules, <S%H6505><s%> 245;
their camels, <S%H1581><s%> 435; [their] donkeys, <S%H2543><s%> 6720.

And some <S%H4480><s%> of the heads <S%H7218><s%> of fathers' [households,] when they arrived <S%H935><s%> at the house <S%H1004><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> is in Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> offered <S%H5068><s%> willingly <S%H5068><s%> for the house <S%H1004><s%> of God <S%H430><s%> to restore <S%H5975><s%> it on its foundation. <S%H4349><s%>

According to their ability <S%H3581><s%> they gave <S%H5414><s%> to the treasury <S%H214><s%> for the work <S%H4399><s%> 61000 gold <S%H2091><s%> drachmas, <S%H1871><s%> and 5000 silver <S%H3701><s%> minas, <S%H4488><s%> and 100 priestly <S%H3548><s%> garments. <S%H3801><s%>

Now the priests <S%H3548><s%> and the Levites, <S%H3881><s%> some <S%H4480><s%> of the people, <S%H5971><s%> the singers, <S%H7891><s%> the gatekeepers, <S%H7778><s%> and the temple <S%H5411><s%> servants <S%H5411><s%> lived <S%H3427><s%> in their cities, <S%H5892><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> in their cities. <S%H5892><s%>
